requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Do you have Windows? Good.
  • Processor: something better than a toaster
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: If you can see this, you're good to go
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Do you have Windows better than XP? Awesome.
  • Processor: Something from 2010+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: If you can see this, you're good to go
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
